showScoreExcerpt:
Overall, the very large and gifted cast is almost too much to be contained on the stage of the Public's Newman Theater, but it's easy enough to envision it all in a much larger Broadway space, where the explosion of music and dance will likely find a better home. If Alicia Keys has anything to say about it, that will happen soon enough.

Read more
